Professional Training & Education:
Summary:
7 years of experience working as QC Coating and Painting Inspector (Saudi Aramco) with 
exposure in the Oil and Gas sectors, includes Onshore Pipelines Laying, Gas distribution Pipelines 
and 6 years of experience working as Painting Supervisor.  Through hand-on experience in all 
levels of testing and acceptance right from project specifications, plan, drawing, field job, etc. 
Planning, Organizing, Co-coordinating and Controlling of Painting and Coating activities and 
carry out Inspection and Surveillance  activities throughout the coatings process (i.e., beginning 
from pre-treatment, blast, primer, in process and final coating inspections) as per project 
specification.


Inspection of Weather condition, Surface Preparation, Salt contamination, Surface


Raise RFI for final inspection / acceptance from Client representative.

Preparing NCR for coating not confirming the specification and discussing with 
project QC Manager for the Corrective or Preventive action to be taken.

Brief Description of Work Responsibilities:


Perform Blotter Paper Test (ASTM D 4285) and check the blasting pressure to ensure
it is specified.


test (ASTM D 4541) if specified.

Ensure timely & periodic inspections of all equipment for their quality, performance

specification.

Measure ambient conditions at the work site throughout the job including dew point, 
RH, air and substrate temperature.


process, substrate cleanliness, anchor profiles, finished coats, etc.
